  • Files
  • Data Structures
  • Data Fields
Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
CSL_DssCbaCfgDSS CBA Config parameters
CSL_DssCscCoeffStructure containing coefficients for Color Space Conversion
CSL_DssGlobalMFlagCfgDSS Global MFLAG Config parameters
CSL_DssOverlayCfgConfiguration for DSS Overlay
CSL_DssOverlayLayerCfgConfiguration for selecting overlay input layers
CSL_DssOverlayPipePosCfgVideo Pipe Position Configuration in Overlay
CSL_DssSafetyChkCfgConfiguration for doing safety checks
CSL_DssVidPipeAlphaCfgDSS Video Pipe Alpha Config parameters
CSL_DssVidPipeCfgConfiguration for DSS Video Pipe
CSL_DssVidPipeDmaCfgDSS Video Pipe DMA related Config parameters
CSL_DssVidPipeLumaCfgDSS Video Pipe Luma Key Config parameters
CSL_DssVidPipeMFlagCfgDSS Video Pipe MFLAG Config parameters
CSL_DssVidPipeVC1CfgDSS Video Pipe VC1 configuration
CSL_DssVpGammaCfgGamma Correction configuration for DSS Video Port Output
CSL_DssVpLcdAdvSignalCfgAdvance Signal Configuration for the LCD
CSL_DssVpLcdBlankTimingCfgBlanking Timing parameters for the LCD
CSL_DssVpLcdOpTimingCfgTiming configuration for the LCD output
CSL_DssVpLcdSignalPolarityCfgPolarity of Active Video, Pixel Clock, HSync and VSync signals for the LCD
CSL_DssVpLcdTdmCfgLCD Configuration for Time Division Multiplexing
Dss_DctrlAdvVpParamsStructure containing advance Video Port information. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_ADV_VP_PARAMS
Dss_DctrlGlobalDssParamsStructure containing global DSS Configuration. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_GLOBAL_DSS_PARAMS
Dss_DctrlLcdBlankTimingParamsStructure containing LCD Blank Timing Configuration. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_LCD_BLANK_TIMING_PARAMS
Dss_DctrlOldiParamsStructure containing OLDI configuration. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_OLDI_PARAMS
Dss_DctrlOverlayLayerParamsStructure containing Overlay layer information. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_LAYER_PARAMS
Dss_DctrlOverlayParamsStructure containing Overlay information. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_OVERLAY_PARAMS
Dss_DctrlPathInfoStructure containing DSS path information. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_PATH. This IOCTL takes the array of edges connected between nodes
Dss_DctrlRegionSafetyChkCfgStructure containing Safety Check configuration for a particular region
Dss_DctrlSyncLostCbParamsStructure containing Sync Lost callback parameters. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_REGISTER_SYNCLOST_CB
Dss_DctrlVpCscCoeffStructure containing Video Port CSC information. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_VP_CSC_COEFF
Dss_DctrlVpErrorStatsStructure containing Error Stats of Video Port. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_GET_VP_ERROR_STATS
Dss_DctrlVpParamsStructure containing Video Port information. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_VP_PARAMS
Dss_DctrlVpSafetyChkParamsStructure containing Safety Check configuration of Video Port. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DCTRL_SET_VP_SAFETY_CHK_PARAMS
Dss_DispBufPrgmCbParamsStructure containing display buffer program callback parameters. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DISP_REGISTER_BUF_PRGM_CB
Dss_DispCreateParamsStructure containing display driver create arguments, used when calling Fvid2_create()
Dss_DispCreateStatusStructure containing create status for the display driver. This should be passed as a status argument while creating the driver
Dss_DispCurrentStatusStructure containing current status of the display driver. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DISP_GET_CURRENT_STATUS
Dss_DispParamsStructure containing DSS parameters. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DISP_SET_DSS_PARAMS
Dss_DispPipeMflagParamsStructure containing Video Pipe Mflag Information. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DISP_SET_PIPE_MFLAG_PARAMS
Dss_DispPipePrgmCbParamsStructure containing video pipe program callback parameters. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DISP_REGISTER_PIPE_PRGM_CB
Dss_DispPipeSafetyChkParamsStructure containing Safety Check configuration of Video Port. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DISP_SET_PIPE_SAFETY_CHK_PARAMS
Dss_DispRtParamsStructure containing run time configuration of the display driver. This needs to be passed along with frame list to update any supported run time parameters
Dss_DispUnderFlowCbParamsStructure containing pipe under flow callback parameters. This structure is used as an argument to IOCTL_DSS_DISP_REGISTER_PIPE_UNDERFLOW_CB
Dss_FrameRtParamsStructure containing run time configuration per frame
Dss_InitParamsDSS initialization parameters
Dss_IrqParamsStructure containing DSS interrupt information. Events should be enabled only for available Video Ports and Video Pipes
Dss_RmInfoStructure containing resources manager information. This enables display sharing between two different softwares
Dss_ScRtParamsStructure containing run time scaler configuration
Dss_SocParamsDSS SOC parameters
Fvid2_CropConfigStructure containing crop configuration - used in Scaler and VCOMP
Fvid2_FormatFVID2 video buffer format specification
Fvid2_FrameFVID2 frame buffer structure
Fvid2_FrameListFVID2 frame buffer list used to exchange multiple FVID2 frames in a single driver call
Fvid2_ModeInfoFVID2 Mode information structure
Fvid2_PosConfigStructure containing position configuration - used in VCOMP and CIG
Fvid2_SizeConfigStructure containing size configuration
Fvid2_SubFrameInfoSub-Frame information
